khyati@... wrote:

>   Hello,
> 
> I am new to JUnit and am using JUnit with JBuilder.
> 
> I am calling a method of a testee class from my test case...
> Now in the testee method, it has to access a global variable "logger"
> (required for logging purpose) defined in that class.
> When i run the test case it gives me NullPointertException for "logger"
> as it is not able to access it.
> Can someone please tell me why it cannot access "logger"...
> 
> Thanks in advance.
> Khyati

When you say "not able to access it," I think you're using the wrong 
words. I think you mean that when the test method tries to use the 
logger variable, it is not yet initialized, and therefore is null.

Q: How do you normally initialize the logger? Can you do that within 
your tests? (You may want to look at TestSetup to do this once for your 
test suite.)
